net.akaish.kitty.orm.query

Class KittyQueryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.akaish.kitty.orm.query.KittyQueryBuilder

  • public class KittyQueryBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple builder to build wrappers for common queries used in KittyORM. Created by akaish on 06.02.18.

    • Method Detail

      • setSumColumn

        public KittyQueryBuilder setSumColumn(java.lang.String sumColumn)
        Sets sum column name for SelectCountQuery : KittyQueryBuilder.QUERY_TYPE.SELECT_SUM (only). Values set via this method in other queries would be ignored.
        Parameters:
        sumColumn - column on which sum operation should be performed.
        Returns:

      • setSchemaName

        public KittyQueryBuilder setSchemaName(java.lang.String schemaName)
        Sets schema name for SelectTableNamesQuery : KittyQueryBuilder.QUERY_TYPE.SELECT_TABLE_NAMES (only). Values set via this method in other queries would be ignored.
        Parameters:
        schemaName - schema name from what should table names to be retrieved.
        Returns:
